mapper.select: SELECT c.cate_id, c.cate_name FROM category c, member m WHERE c.cate_id IN (m.m_interesting1, m.m_interesting2) AND m.m_id = #{m_id }

SELECT p.p_id, p.m_id, p.p_coverImg, p.p_title, p.p_summary, m.m_studentID authorID, m.m_name authorName, (SELECT count(*) from member_action where act_type='like' AND act_what=p.p_id) p_likenum, p.p_viewnum, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(h.h_value SEPARATOR ',') FROM hashtag h WHERE h.p_id = p.p_id) hashtags FROM project p, member m where p.m_id=m.m_id AND p.p_type=1 ORDER BY p.p_date DESC

SELECT p.p_id, p.m_id, p.p_coverImg, p.p_title, p.p_summary, m.m_studentID authorID, m.m_name authorName, (SELECT count(*) from member_action where act_type='like' AND act_what=p.p_id) p_likenum, p.p_viewnum, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(h.h_value SEPARATOR ',') FROM hashtag h WHERE h.p_id = p.p_id) hashtags FROM project p, member m where p.m_id=m.m_id AND p.cate_id=#{category } ORDER BY p.p_date DESC

SELECT p.p_id, p.m_id, p.p_coverImg, p.p_title, p.p_summary, m.m_studentID authorID, m.m_name authorName, (SELECT count(*) from member_action where act_type='like' AND act_what=p.p_id) p_likenum, p.p_viewnum, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(h.h_value SEPARATOR ',') FROM hashtag h WHERE h.p_id = p.p_id) hashtags FROM project p, member m where p.m_id=m.m_id AND p.p_type=0 AND p.cate_id=#{category } ORDER BY p.p_date DESC

SELECT p.p_id, p.m_id, p.p_coverImg, p.p_title, p.p_summary, m.m_studentID authorID, m.m_name authorName, (SELECT count(*) FROM member_action where act_type='like' AND act_what=p.p_id) p_likenum, p.p_viewnum, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(h.h_value SEPARATOR ',') FROM hashtag h WHERE h.p_id = p.p_id) hashtags FROM project p, member m, member_action ma WHERE p.m_id=m.m_id AND p.p_id=ma.act_what AND ma.act_type='like' AND ma.act_from=#{m_id} ORDER BY p.p_date desc
